sentences.en: "Are you mad?" David asked explosively.
sentences.cn: “你疯了吗？”戴维暴躁地问道。

sentences.en: "You're mad," the driver blurted out.
sentences.cn: “你疯了，”司机脱口而出。

sentences.en: He can’t possibly get that finished in time. He must be mad !

sentences.en: I really must be quite mad!

sentences.en: I’d go mad (= start to feel crazy ) if I was stuck at home all day.
sentences.cn: 如果我整天困在家里我会发疯的。

sentences.en: I'm afraid Jean-Paul has gone raving mad.
sentences.cn: 恐怕让－保罗已经完全失去理智了。

sentences.en: I'm pretty mad about it, I can tell you.
sentences.cn: 告诉你，我对这件事感到非常恼火。

sentences.en: It’s enough to send you barking mad (= completely crazy ) .
sentences.cn: 这足以让你发狂。

sentences.cn: 让我们狂欢吧、大把大把地花钱吧。

sentences.en: My friends all think I’m stark raving mad (= completely crazy ) .
sentences.cn: 我的朋友都认为我是彻底疯了。

sentences.en: She was mad keen to go.
sentences.cn: 她非常想去。

sentences.en: She's not as mad about sport as I am.
sentences.cn: 她不像我对体育那么痴迷。

sentences.en: some men are &B{mad keen on} football.
sentences.cn: 有些男人对足球极其狂热。

sentences.en: Surely no one would be mad enough to fly in this weather?
sentences.cn: 肯定没有人会傻到在这样的天气条件下飞行吧？

sentences.en: The builder looked at me as though I was barking mad.
sentences.cn: 那个建筑工人瞅着我，好像我哪不对劲儿似的。

sentences.en: The disease is more commonly known as Mad Cow Disease.
sentences.cn: 这种疾病更通俗的名称是疯牛病。

sentences.en: Then there was the mad rush not to be late for school.
sentences.cn: 然后就是匆忙往学校赶，以免迟到。

sentences.en: There are certain things he does that drive me mad.
sentences.cn: 他的某些举动让我很生气。

sentences.en: This mad writer kept a lobster as a pet.
sentences.cn: 这个疯狂的作家把龙虾当宠物养。

sentences.en: You are mad, Isabel. You should be locked up.
sentences.cn: 你疯了，伊莎贝尔。应该把你关起来才是。

sentences.en: You make me so mad!
